info.title: PKIsigning
info.description: Automate your document signing needs with the PKIsigning platform connector. Send documents to the PKIsigning platform; send invites and retrieve the signed documents.

get.summary: Retrieve all actors of a document

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: hasActed
parameters.description: Read only value to check if an actor has acted on the document already.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Has actor acted on the document

200.description: A list of actors with a role in the document.

get.description: Retrieve a list of signers and/or recipients for the document.

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: actorModel
parameters.description: Information of the actor to create.

post.description: Create an actor and add it to a document.

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an actor.

parameters.name: actorModel
parameters.description: Information of the actor to create.

200.description: The updated information on an actor.

put.description: Update information on a specific actor.

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an actor.

get.description: Get information on a specific actor.

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an actor.

delete.description: Removes the specified actor from the document.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of actors for the dossier

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: hasActed
parameters.description: Read only value to check if an actor has acted on the document already.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Has actor acted on the document

200.description: A list of actors with a role in the dossier.

get.description: Retrieve a list of actors that have any role on any document within the dossier.

post.summary: Resend an invite to the an actor (next actor for now, actorId ignored)

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an actor.

post.description: Resend an invite to the current actor.

post.summary: Withdraw an action invite (next invite, actorId is ignored for now)

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an actor.

post.description: Withdraw the invite for the current actor.

post.summary: Create a new document by uploading it

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique id of the dossier where this document will belong to.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file to be processed (only specific filetypes).

post.description: Add a new document to a specific dossier.

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId

parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Updated metadata

delete.summary: Delete a document from a dossier

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

204.description: The document was successfully removed from the dossier.

delete.description: Remove a document from a dossier.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The dossier to be created.

get.summary: Get all metadata of a dossier

parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Dossier to update

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

delete.description: Permanently delete a dossier and all it's documents.

get.summary: Download a dossier and its documents

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

200.description: A zipfile of the dossier and its contents.

get.description: Download a dossier and its document as a zip file.

post.summary: Signal the beginning of the workflow

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

204.description: The workflow has been started successfully.

post.description: Send invitations to all actors in the dossier.

get.summary: Get a list of papertypes with thumbnails

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an organisation.

200.description: A ;ost pf papertypes that are available to the organisation.

get.description: Returns a list of all paper types (e.g. backgrounds) for an organisation.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an organisation.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name as to be shown to the user

parameters.name: Background
parameters.description: Formfield to upload the file

200.description: Information about the newly created papertype.

parameters.description: The unique ID of an organisation.

parameters.name: papertypeId

parameters.description: Formfield to upload the file

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of an organisation.

parameters.name: papertypeId

204.description: The specified papertype was successfully deleted.

get.summary: Get all workgroups for an organisation

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the Organisation.

200.description: A list of workgroups for the specified organisation.

get.description: Get a list of workgroups for an organisation. The key can be used in the call to create a new dossier.

delete.summary: Remove multiple pages from a document

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: The specific page numbers in a document.

204.description: The specified pages have been deleted from the document.

delete.description: Remove multiple pages from a document.

post.summary: Change the background of one or more pages in the document

parameters.name: dossierId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dossier.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Information about the background to apply

204.description: The background of the specified pages was successfully changed.

post.description: Change the background of one or more pages in the document.

schema.title: WebhookContentModel
schema.description: Information about the status update of a dossier

post.summary: Register a new webhook for this organisation
post.description: Register an url for callback upon a statuschange. The PKIsigning platform will report any statusupdates of dossiers within this organisation to this url.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Webhook details

Events.description: The events that the webhook is associated with.

Config.description: Information about the configuration of a webhook

url.description: the url associated with the webhook.

Active.description: This value indicates if the webhook is active.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: Id of the organisation

email.description: Personal email address of the actor.

mobile.description: Mobile phone number of the actor

deadline.description: The deadline for the actor to perform the action.

order.description: Order in which actors should perform actions on the document

emailActivity.description: Metadata of email messages as sent by the platform to this actor

signingDate.description: Date on which the actor has performed its action

hasSigned.description: Has the actor performed an action

validateRealIdentity.description: Should the real identity of the actor be verified (e.g. IDIN)

fieldName.description: The fieldname to sign by this signer

placeholder.description: The placeholder to look for in the document to position a new signaturefield

SignerActivity.description: Metadata of email message send to an actor

event.description: Event for which the email was sent

reason.description: Reason as indicated by the document owner

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the email was sent

pkisInviteId.description: InviteId to which the message belongs

email.description: Email address to where the message was sent

lastUpdate.description: LastUpdate when the document entered the platform.

pages.description: Number of pages in the document.

created.description: The date and time that the document was made.

expires.description: The date and time that the document will expire.

id.description: The unique id of the document.

signed.description: This value indicates if the document has been signed.

signatures.description: A list containing the data of all signatures on the document.

emptySignatureFields.description: A list containing the data of all signatures that have not been placed on the document.

containsBlankSignatureFields.description: This value indicates if the document has blank signatures fields.

actors.description: A list of actors that have an association with the document.

dossierId.description: The unique id of the associated dossier.

signerNote.description: A field for extra information that will be shown to the Signers.

recipientNote.description: A field for extra information that will be shown to the Recipients.

isMyDocument.description: This field indicates if the account that is associated with the request owns the document.

dossierIndex.description: The index of the document in the dossier.

subject.description: The subject line of the certificate

issuer.description: The person that placed the signature.

date.description: The date and time when the signature has been placed.

location.description: The location where the Signature has been placed.

euQualified.description: This value indicates the certificate is an eu qualified certificate.

advanced.description: This value indicates the certificate is an advanced certificate.

eSeal.description: This value indicates of the certificate used is eseal qualified.

name.description: The name of the signature field.

page.description: The page of the document where the signature field has been placed.

x.description: The X coordinates where the signature field starts.

y.description: The Y coordinates where the signature field starts.

height.description: The Y Value of the size of signature field.

width.description: The X Value of the size of signature field.

filename.description: The name of the file associated with the document.

documents.description: List of documents beloging to this dossier

dossierName.description: Name of the Dossier the document belongs to

signed.description: True if the document already has a signature

signerNote.description: An extra information field that will be shown to the signer.

recipientNote.description: An extra information field that will be shown to the recipient.

accorderNote.description: An extra information field that will be shown to the accorder.

expires.description: The date and time when the dossier will expire.

emailActivity.description: A list of the emails that have been send.

myDossier.description: A value indicating if the account associated with the request owns the dossier.

taxPaymentStatus.description: An extra information field that indicates the status of the tax payment.

workgroup.description: this is the description of the workgroup

clearancelevel.description: A dossier is only visible to other users with the same or higher clearance level with a workgroup

documentName.description: Name of the Dossier the document belongs to

CreateDossierModel.description: Information required for a new dossier

workgroupId.description: Id of the workgroup in which the dossier will reside

owner.description: Emailaddress of the owner of the dossier

id.description: The unique is of the background.

PaperTypeModel.description: A papertype to be used as background

name.description: Name as to be shown to the user

OrganisationWorkgroup.description: A workgroup that is used within a dossier

PageIndicesModel.description: Default model containing pages to perform an action on

pages.description: a list of pagenumbers that will be removed.

backgrounds.description: Collection of pages with their background to use

pageNr.description: Number of the page to set the background for.

backgroundId.description: Id of the background to use. Use null to remove the background.

removePreviousBackground.description: This value indicates if the current background needs to be removed.

events.description: The events that the webhook is associated with.

active.description: This value indicates if the webhook is active.

id.description: The unique id of the webhook.

created.description: The date and time of when the webhook has been created.

lastUpdate.description: The date and time of when the webhook has been updated.

WebhookConfig.description: Information about the configuration of a webhook

url.description: the url associated with the webhook.

scopes.pkisigning.platform: Required to access default platform API's
